assignments.name: PROFILE
assignments.value:
=- Name: Addi
- Age: 28
- Profession: Nature photographer
- What she does
    - Travels around the globe to photograph natural sites
    - Shares educational facts about nature and wildlife
    - Presenter
- Typical posts
    - Taking photos / being in nature
    - Research packing for trip (with computer, camera equipment)
    - Dressed up / speaking at an event
    - Watching sunrise / sunset
- Appearance
    - Eurasian (purposefully ambiguous)
    - Medium length brown hair, brown eyes
    - Tanned skin
- Dress
    - Collared short-sleeve shirts, shorts, white or tan
    - Plain T-shirts and long pants

Inspired by 
- David Attenborough
    - British host, biologist, natural historian, writer
    - Advocacy: conservation, ecology
- Robert Irwin

Get posts from the past 7 days

parameters.content:
# Post to instagram
# [Guide to setup Facebook (Instagram)](https://github.com/gyoridavid/ai_agents_az/blob/main/episode_8/guide-instagram.md)

# Use any LLM provider

- ollama
- openrouter
- openai
- gemini
- ...

parameters.text:
=Create a social media post for this artificial person, who's sharing her life on Instagram using the instructions below.
Use the detailed weekly plan to find what to post today. Make sure to look at the previous posts (if available) to make sure the post fits to the plan in a logical order.

For each post, generate an instagram post (text content and an image generation prompt). 
As I'm using a reference image for the image generation, don't describe the general look of the person, and start with "create a photorealistic image of me", and continue with describing the scene in great detail, make it a few paragraph long. Make sure the image prompt includes "do not add any text on the image".
Create a short summary of the post for cateloging purposes.

<PersonalProfile>
{{ $('Configure workflow').item.json.PROFILE }}
</PersonalProfile>

<WeeklyPlan>
{{ $('Weekly plan aggregate').item.json.data[0].plan_value }}
</WeeklyPlan>

<DayOfTheWeek>
{{ $now.format('EEEE') }}
</DayOfTheWeek>

{{ !$json.data[0].isEmpty() ? `
<PreviousPosts>
${$json.data.map(item => `
<Post>
  <PostedAt>${item.created_at}</PostedAt>
  <Content>${item.post_summary}</Content>
</Post>
`).join('\n')}
</PreviousPosts>
` : '' }}

{{ $json.change_requests ? `
The post was already generated, please apply the change requests

<PostContent>
${$json.post_content}
</PostContent>

<ImagePrompt>
${$json.image_prompt}
</ImagePrompt>

<ChangeRequests>
${$json.change_requests}
</ChangeRequests>
` : '' }}

attributes.name: post_content
attributes.description: the instagram post's text content to share with the image. use emojis, hashtags

attributes.name: image_prompt
attributes.description: the image prompt to use to generate the social media image

options.systemPromptTemplate: You are a social media expert. Create a post for instagram based on the instructions.

attributes.name: quarterly_plan
attributes.description: quarterly plan in a markdows format
